Ability.Name: -- RET: DS --
Ability.Lua:
if not PQR_init then
function SpecialAggro(t) local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot", "Icy Tomb", "Risen Ghoul", "Mana Void", "Burning Tendons", "Wing Tentacle", "Arm Tentacle", "Twilight Assault Drake", "Goriona", "Ice Tomb" } for _,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName(t) == v then return true end end end
function ImmuneTarget(t) local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977, 102915, 100686, 105784, 74938 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
SetCVar("Sound_EnableErrorSpeech", 0) PQR_init = true end
-- Global Variables -- Tlvl = UnitLevel("target") HolyPower = UnitPower("player", 9) DP = UnitBuff("player", "Divine Purpose") Zea = UnitBuff("player", "Zealotry") AW = UnitBuffID("player", 31884) AoW = UnitBuff("player", "The Art of War") Php = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") Pmana = 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") Thp = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") InCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("player") Rck = IsSpellInRange("Crusader Strike", "target")
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 0.3 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if not aoe then aoe = true print("AOE: \124cFF15E61CEnabled") else aoe = false print("AOE: \124cFFE61515Disabled") end end
if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or UnitIsDead("player") or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",80169) or UnitBuffID("player",87959) or UnitChannelInfo("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: -- RET: OS --
Ability.Lua: if UnitIsDead("target") or ImmuneTarget("target") or not UnitCanAttack("player","target") or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not SpecialAggro("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) or IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(20271)),"target") == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Special Events By Sheuron --
Ability.Lua:
-- Avoid sudden death on Ultraxion local fadingtime = select(7,UnitDebuffID("player",110070)) if fadingtime and fadingtime - GetTime() < 1 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Avoid Hour of Twilight on Ultraxion, Delete next 3 lines if you are working as tank local channelSpell, _, _, _, _, endTime = UnitCastingInfo("boss1") if channelSpell == GetSpellInfo(109417) and endTime/1000 - GetTime() < 1 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Try to aim on Darkmoon Faerie Cannon local canontime = select(7,UnitBuffID("player",102116)) if canontime and canontime - GetTime() < 1.15 then CancelUnitBuff("player","Magic Wings") end

Ability.Name: RET: Inquisition
Ability.Lua:
local Inq, _, _, _, _, _, time = UnitBuffID("player", 84963)
if Inq ~= nil then if ( DP ~= nil or HolyPower == 3 ) and time - GetTime() <= 4 then return true end else if DP ~= nil or HolyPower >= 1 then return true end end

Ability.Name: BoM / Kings
Ability.Lua:
local BoM = UnitBuff("player", "Blessing of Might") local Kings = UnitBuff("player", "Blessing of Kings") local MotW = UnitBuffID("player", 1126)
if BoM == nil then CastSpellByID(19740) return true end

Ability.Name: RET: Seals
Ability.Lua:
local SoT = UnitBuffID("player", 31801) local SoR = UnitBuffID("player", 20154)
if aoe then if SoR == nil then CastSpellByID(20154) end else if SoT == nil then CastSpellByID(31801) end end

Ability.Name: Auras
Ability.Lua:
local Aura = GetShapeshiftForm("player")
if not UnitIsDead("player") then if Aura ~= 5 and IsMounted() then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") CastShapeshiftForm(5) RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") elseif Aura ~= 1 and Aura ~= 2 and Aura ~= 4 and IsMounted() == nil then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") CastShapeshiftForm(2) RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") end end

Ability.Name: RET: CS
Ability.Lua: if Rck == 1 then if not aoe and not DP and HolyPower < 3 then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: HoW
Ability.Lua: if ( AW ~= nil or Thp <= 20 ) then return true end

Ability.Name: RET: Exo
Ability.Lua: if AoW ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: RET: TV
Ability.Lua: if Rck == 1 then if DP ~= nil or HolyPower == 3 then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: J
Ability.Lua:
local CScd = GetSpellCooldown(35395)
if Zea then if CScd ~= 0 and not DP and HolyPower < 3 then return true end else if not DP and HolyPower < 3 then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: HW
Ability.Lua:
local CScd = GetSpellCooldown(35395) local Jcd = GetSpellCooldown(20271)
if Rck == 1 then if CScd ~= 0 and Jcd ~= 0 then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: Cons
Ability.Lua:
local CScd = GetSpellCooldown(35395) local Jcd = GetSpellCooldown(20271)
if Rck == 1 then if CScd ~= 0 and Jcd ~= 0 then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: AW
Ability.Lua: if Rck == 1 then if ( Tlvl == -1 or Tlvl >= 87 ) and Zea ~= nil then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: GoAK
Ability.Lua: if Rck == 1 then if ( Tlvl == -1 or Tlvl >= 87 ) and Thp > 5 then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: Zea
Ability.Lua: if Rck == 1 then if ( Tlvl == -1 or Tlvl >= 87 ) then if (DP ~= nil or HolyPower == 3) and not aoe then return true end end end

Ability.Name: RET: DS
Ability.Lua: if Rck == 1 then if aoe then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: Divine Prot
Ability.Lua: if Php <= 80 then return true end

Ability.Name: Divine Shield
Ability.Lua: if Php <= 15 then return true end

Ability.Name: Divine Plea
Ability.Lua: if Pmana < 10 then return true end

Ability.Name: RET: HoJ
Ability.Lua: if Rck == 1 then if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() then return true end end

Ability.Name: RET: HoF
Ability.Lua: if IsRightControlKeyDown() then return true end

Ability.Name: Use: Gloves
Ability.Lua:
local _, Cooldown, Ready = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",10)
if Cooldown == 0 and Ready == 1 then
UseInventoryItem(10) return true
end

Ability.Name: Use: Trinket 1
Ability.Lua:
local _, Cooldown, Ready = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13)
if Cooldown == 0 and Ready == 1 then
UseInventoryItem(13) return true
end

Ability.Name: Use: Trinket 2
Ability.Lua:
local _, Cooldown, Ready = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14)
if Cooldown == 0 and Ready == 1 then
UseInventoryItem(14) return true
end

Ability.Name: RET: TarSys
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") ~= nil and UnitName("target") == "" then TargetNearestEnemy() return true end
